attributes.action: stop thick people from going out between 7am and 6pm.  they are an absurd annoyance...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: thick people is so annoying - they make the simple daily tasks so exhausting!  stay home eh?

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
